sentence.Network_en: The company laid off 65,000 workers after commercial-jet orders dried up.
sentence.Network_cn: 商务飞机订单减少后公司精减了65,000名工人。

sentence.Network_en: Warm breezes from the South dried up the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自南方的温暖和风吹干了街道。

sentence.Network_en: The pool had dried up and was full of bracken and reeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 水塘已经干涸，里面都是欧洲蕨和芦苇。

PerfectNetExp.abs: dried-density 干密度, dried-up 干耗, dried-fig 无花果干

list.abs: “枯”的意思？_庆余年吧_百度贴吧 ... 同本义[ wither] 干涸[ dried up] 空[ empty].
枯_百度百科 ... [withered and rotten] 枯萎朽烂 [dried up] 干枯，干燥 [dull and dry;uninteresting] 单调，无趣味.

entry.def: If you describe someone as dried-up, you are saying rudely that they are old and dull, and not worth paying attention to.

example.ex: ...her fears of becoming a dried-up old prune.
example.tran: 她对变成一个干瘪老太太的恐惧

means.word_mean: 1. (used especially of vegetation) having lost all moisture;

sentences.sentence: "the desert was edged with sere vegetation"
